\subsection*{Work Experience}
\noindent\rule{\textwidth}{1pt}
Software Engineering Intern \textemdash\ \texttt{Google Inc.}\hfill{}Summer of 2016
\begin{itemize}
  \setlength\itemsep{1pt}
\item Wrote \textbf{Go} services to automatically test video applications on consumer devices
\item Hands on experience with \textbf{PS4} and \textbf{Xbox One} development kits
\end{itemize}
Software Engineering Intern \textemdash\ \texttt{Google Inc.}\hfill{}Summer of 2015
\begin{itemize}
  \setlength\itemsep{1pt}
\item Worked on the Census team maintaining a large and integral \textbf{C++} code base
\item Added new heap tracking features to the Google's core \textbf{profiling} tools
\item Removed undefined behavior in the code base by making it \textbf{ISO C++11 standard compliant}
\end{itemize}
Software Engineering Intern \textemdash\ \texttt{Google Inc.}\hfill{}Summer of 2014
\begin{itemize}
  \setlength\itemsep{1pt}
\item Wrote a tool based on \textbf{Clang} to rename symbols across multiple \textbf{C++} files
\item Released the tool as \textbf{open-source} with the name \textbf{Clang-Rename}
\item \url{clang.llvm.org/extra/clang-rename.html}
\end{itemize}

\subsection*{Relevant Works}
\noindent\rule{\textwidth}{1pt}
MGF: Matt's Game Framework \textemdash\ \url{crates.io/crates/mgf}
\begin{itemize}
  \setlength\itemsep{1pt}
\item Collision detection and rigid body physics simulation library for the \textbf{Rust} programming language.
\item Implements many unique dynamic collision detection routines, such as exact moving capsule collisions without the use of approximate GJK.
\item Released as a crate and downloadable via Rust's built-in package manager, Cargo.
\end{itemize}
Article: Writing A Simple Garbage Collector in C \textemdash\ \url{maplant.com/gc.html}
\begin{itemize}
  \setlength\itemsep{1pt}
\item Article I wrote in my spare time to demonstrate how to research and program algorithms that initially seem too obtuse
\item Well received, reached the front page of \texttt{Hacker News} and published in the magazine \texttt{Hacker News Monthly}
\end{itemize}
FACT \textemdash\ \url{github.com/dataanalysiscosby/FACT}
\begin{itemize}
  \setlength\itemsep{1pt}
\item Programming language designed and implemented from scratch in \textbf{C} my freshman year of high school
\item By the time it was finished it had a custom recursive descent parser that was compiled into bytecode for my own custom virtual machine
\end{itemize}

\subsection*{Additional Experience}
\noindent\rule{\textwidth}{1pt}
Compiler Research at UIUC \textemdash\ \url{allvm.org}
\begin{itemize}
  \setlength\itemsep{1pt}
\item Became a member of the ALLVM research group, headed by Vikram Adve
\item Wrote a senior thesis on using Gated SSA to detect duplicate code blocks
\item Implemented On Stack Replacement for \textbf{LLVM}'s McJIT for the graduate level
  class CS 526 Compiler Construction
\end{itemize}
